column4: odd - is /etc/apt/sources.list supposed to reference edgy all over the place?
you're running gutsy? are the lines with edgy commented out?
no, I'm running 7/4 (feisty?)  and no, they're not commented out.
hmm.. then I guess.. no.. there shouldn't be edgy all over the place in your sources.list.. not afaik
should it be gutsy?
does your computer work? run "lsb_release -a" in a terminal.. what does it say?
yeah, it works fine otherwise - it tells me that I'm on feisty.
can you pastebin your sources.list ?
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/51390/
anything weird in there?  Should it be gutsy?  or feisty?
the sources.list looks very normal... for a edgy-machine..
it's wasted on my computer afaik.. don't know if it's a general thing or just for me
have you checked the bug list on launchpad for the bluetooth system?
I've never tried bluetooth on a computer before...so dunno.
Nope...not used to that...letme try.
WOrks.....
But very difficult for video/photos.
Try this...I wrote it...works perfect for audio
http://linuxhack3r.com/2008/04/07/x360mediaserve-stream-music-to-your-360-in-linux/
